item.title: The Straw Bale House- Paul Lacinski
item.description: http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=0yX-KFMFvTo Paul Lacinski, co-author of Serious Straw Bale, details how buildings made with straw bales are extraordinarily energy efficient, comfortable to live in and …
